name: semver-resolver
description: Calculate an 'optimal' solution for a dependency tree using semantic versioning

scripts.test: babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --report lcov --report text --report html _mocha -- --recursive --reporter spec $npm_package_config_testdir
scripts.checkunstaged: git diff --exit-code -- . ':!$npm_package_config_builddir' > /dev/null || (echo 'Error: unstaged changes outside the $npm_package_config_builddir folder should be staged and committed first' && false)
scripts.checkuncommitted: git diff --cached --exit-code -- . ':!$npm_package_config_builddir' > /dev/null || (echo 'Error: staged changes outside the $npm_package_config_builddir folder should be committed first' && false)
scripts.commitlib: git add -A $npm_package_config_builddir && if ! git diff --cached --exit-code; then git commit -m 'build $npm_package_config_builddir'; fi
